amendatorysection.para: The general purpose of the Nebraska Poultry Improvement Association is to foster, promote, improve, and protect all branches of the poultry, turkey, egg, and allied industries. For uses appropriate to its purpose and business, such association may take by gift, purchase, devise, or bequest real and personal property, and may handle, manage, control, sell, lease, and mortgage the same. It may employ such necessary agents, servants, fiduciaries, and assistants as may be necessary to care for its business and property.
